data.title: Malawi Spopulation 2024
data.meta_description:
Year wise population of Malawi from 1950 to 2100 by United Nations. Data tables and
charts.
data.text:
The current population of Malawi is 21,728,909 as of August 18, 2024, based on interpolation of the latest United Nations data. The population of Malawi is projected at 21,475,962, or 21.48 million, as of July 1, 2024. The total population in Malawi is projected at 20,931,751, or 20.93 million people for the year 2023.

Malawi ranks 62nd in the world by population on the 237 countries and territories list. Malawi is ranked 21st among 58 countries and territories in Africa.
